original_text: Before the coming of this faith, we were held in custody under the law, locked up until the faith that was to come would be revealed.
korean_text: 믿음이 오기 전에 우리는 율법 아래에 매인 바 되고 계시될 믿음의 때까지 갇혔느니라

sentences.original_text: Before the coming of this faith
we were held in custody under the law
locked up until the faith that was to come
